statements: SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT target_audience, open_rate, click_rate FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, click_rate FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Promotion';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE open_rate > 0.2 AND click_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_type FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience, click_rate FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-08-31' ORDER BY click_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_audience FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE click_rate = (SELECT MAX(click_rate) FROM EmailCampaigns);
SELECT * FROM candidates;
SELECT candidate_name, email FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM candidates ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_candidates FROM candidates;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, email FROM candidates WHERE date_added BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT candidate_name, email, date_added FROM candidates ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Young Adults' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM passive_candidates;
SELECT id, email, first_name FROM passive_candidates WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, campaign_name, status FROM email_campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT cr.id, pc.first_name, ec.campaign_name FROM campaign_responses cr JOIN passive_candidates pc ON cr.candidate_id = pc.id JOIN email_campaigns ec ON cr.campaign_id = ec.id;
SELECT * FROM passive_candidates;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, company FROM passive_candidates WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer';
SELECT email, company FROM passive_candidates WHERE company LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, response_status, response_date FROM email_campaigns JOIN campaign_responses ON email_campaigns.id = campaign_responses.campaign_id WHERE response_status = 'Interested';
SELECT * FROM candidate_details ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, email_address, current_job_title FROM candidate_details WHERE current_employer = 'Company X';
SELECT candidate_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM candidate_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM campaign_history WHERE campaign_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_date DESC;
SELECT job_title, location, salary_range FROM job_opportunities WHERE salary_range > 50000 ORDER BY salary_range ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_details ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT campaign_name, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM campaign_history WHERE interaction_type = 'Email'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM candidate_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' AND current_employer IS NOT NULL
SELECT opportunity_id, job_title, location, salary_range FROM job_opportunities WHERE salary_range > 50000 ORDER BY salary_range DESC

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, j.job_title, j.location FROM candidate_details c JOIN candidate_job_interest ci ON c.candidate_id = ci.candidate_id JOIN job_opportunities j ON ci.opportunity_id = j.opportunity_id
SELECT * FROM passive_candidates;
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_name, email_address FROM passive_candidates WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT * FROM campaign_recipients ORDER BY recipient_id DESC;
SELECT job_title, job_location FROM job_opportunities WHERE job_requirements->>'experience' = '2 years';
SELECT * FROM passive_candidates;
SELECT candidate_id, candidate_name, email_address FROM passive_candidates WHERE candidate_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, is_active FROM email_campaigns WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT recipient_id, recipient_email FROM campaign_recipients WHERE is_engaged = true ORDER BY recipient_id DESC;
SELECT job_title, job_description, job_location FROM job_opportunities WHERE job_location = 'New York' AND job_requirements->>'experience' >= '3 years';
